ModMetaData.name: Allow Dead Animals
ModMetaData.author: Andrew Raphael Lukasik
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that auto-allows freshly killed animals for butchering.
Made for people tired of constantly manually looking around for animals killed by wild predators to steal their meal.
Source code: https://github.com/andrew-raphael-lukasik/rimworld-mod_allow-dead-animals
